attributes.action: A far harsher stance on all illegal drugs
attributes.additional_details:
Drugs are and always will cause health problems, social problems and cause damage to lives and the people who use and are surrounded by drugs, legalising drugs will not remove the problem it will simply make it ok for thoes who use drugs to use them more and thus just as with many other failed government policies result in the problem getting worse.

Sign this petiton if you beleive in the removal of drug classes and instead enploy the maxium sentence for class A drugs to all drugs, harsher sentencing for drug smugglers and dealers (life imprisonment) and forced rehabilitation programmes for all drug users regardless of quantity or drug used,

The majority of drug users are young adults, we need to make drug use not worth the risk, the majority of people would not kill in the knowledge of the consequences (life imprisonment) make it the same for all drugs.
